name: @cloudquery/plugin-pb-js

scripts.proto-prepare: cd plugin-pb && git pull && cd .. && rm -rf ./protos && mkdir -p ./protos/plugin/v3 && mkdir -p ./protos/discovery/v1 && cp -r ./plugin-pb/plugin/v3/* ./protos/plugin/v3 && cp -r ./plugin-pb/discovery/v1/* ./protos/discovery/v1
scripts.build: npm run proto-prepare && npm run proto-gen && rm -rf dist && tsc

description: This is a low-level auto-generated gRPC client and server for CloudQuery plugins
author: cloudquery (https://github.com/cloudquery)
